title: KAYAPO Women's Micromodal Breathable Ultrasoft Lightweight Comfortable Bikini Underwear, Assorted Colors, Multipack
features: LIKE A SECOND SKIN: Looking to the Kayapo Tribe for inspiration, our women’s underwear will make you feel as though you are naked. The material used in our underwear for women fits like a second skin, and it is exceptionally comfortable against your body.

MOISTURE WICKING: Our light and breathable fabric is better than cotton underwear at keeping you dry. These underwear bikinis will provide you with ultimate comfort thanks to their moisture wicking ability. This same fabric property also ensures that your women underwear is resistant to odors, too.

SOFT AND LUXURIOUS: Micro modal fabric is known for its softness, with some designers saying it is softer than silk. To give you the softest and most luxurious breathable underwear women possible, our women’s underwear is made with this natural and eco-friendly material.

QUALITY DESIGN: These underwear bikinis are designed with your comfort in mind. The women’s underwear are tagless, feature a durable waistband, and they are stitched with flatlock seams. These implements ensure you don’t experience chafing, friction, or discomfort when wearing our woman underwear.

CUSTOMER SATISFACTION: We are positive you will be pleased with your underwear women pack, but we understand that things happen. If you find that your women bikini underwear are not what you expected, or for some reason you are not pleased with them, please reach out to us so we can make it right.
description: Taking Inspiration From The Kayapo Tribe
Our breathable underwear for women are modeled after the lifestyle of the Kayapo Tribe of Brazil.
These people are as close to their natural state as can be.
We designed our women bikini underwear to feel like a second skin, bringing you as close to your natural being as possible.
Our women bikinis pack are made with a fabric blend containing Micro Modal fabric.
Micro Modal is derived from beechwood trees and is as close to natural as you can get.
We pride ourselves on the fact that the material used in our woman underwear comes from a source that is earth friendly.
When you wear your underwear for women, you can have peace in knowing that you are wearing a sustainable fabric.
The Micro Modal fabric used in our underwear bikini offers several benefits for your comfort.
Our women’s underwear are extremely lightweight and breathable.
This allows the woman underwear to be odor resistant and moisture wicking so that you can remain comfortable throughout your day.
Additionally, our women’s underwear will not cause you any chafing or other discomfort thanks to the flatlock seams used when creating them.
These women bikinis underwear have a durable waistband, and are tagless for your comfort, as well.
For ultimate comfort, add these breathable underwear for women to your cart today, and dare to go naked.
